dcterms:creator: Nicolas Audebert
Bertrand Le Saux
Sébastien Lefèvre
dcterms:description: The University of Pavia dataset is a hyperspectral image dataset captured by the ROSIS sensor, consisting of 103 spectral bands and covering an urban area in Pavia, Italy. It contains 42776 labeled samples across 9 classes.
dcterms:title: University of Pavia (UP)

dcterms:creator: Jie Liang
Jun Zhou
Yuntao Qian
Lian Wen
Xiao Bai
Yongsheng Gao
dcterms:description: The Salinas dataset is a hyperspectral image dataset collected in California using the AVIRIS sensor, featuring 204 spectral bands and containing 54129 labeled samples across 16 classes.
dcterms:title: Salinas

dcterms:creator: MA Friedl
C Woodcock
S Gopal
D Muchoney
AH Strahler
C Barker-Schaaf
dcterms:description: The Dioni dataset is a hyperspectral image dataset captured by the Hyperion sensor, consisting of 176 spectral bands and containing 20024 labeled samples across 12 classes.
dcterms:title: Dioni

dcterms:creator: Danfeng Hong
Zhu Han
Jing Yao
Lianru Gao
Bing Zhang
Antonio Plaza
Jocelyn Chanussot
dcterms:description: The DFC2018 dataset is part of the IEEE GRSS data fusion contest, featuring hyperspectral images captured by the ITRES CASI sensor with 48 spectral bands and containing 504712 labeled samples across 20 classes.
dcterms:title: DFC2018
